Process Description: Defines the strategic investment approach and mandate for a fund, aligning with risk appetite, asset allocation, and performance objectives. This process sets the foundation for portfolio construction and compliance with regulatory and client requirements.
Sub-Process Description: Establishes the fund’s primary investment objective, aligning risk-return expectations with investor profile, benchmark orientation, and regulatory considerations. Guides portfolio construction, performance attribution, and disclosure.
Data Entity Description: Statement of the fund’s core purpose and desired outcome.
Data Element Description: Classification (e.g., Capital Appreciation, Income, Total Return, Absolute Return).

Data Entity Description: Statement of the fund’s core purpose and desired outcome.
Data Element Description: Formal description of the investment aim and expected benefits.

Process Description: Defines the strategic investment approach and mandate for a fund, aligning with risk appetite, asset allocation, and performance objectives. This process sets the foundation for portfolio construction and compliance with regulatory and client requirements.

Data Element Description: Relative (benchmark-aware) vs. absolute (target return independent of benchmark).

Process Description: Defines the strategic investment approach and mandate for a fund, aligning with risk appetite, asset allocation, and performance objectives. This process sets the foundation for portfolio construction and compliance with regulatory and client requirements.
Sub-Process Description: Establishes the fund’s primary investment objective, aligning risk-return expectations with investor profile, benchmark orientation, and regulatory considerations. Guides portfolio construction, performance attribution, and disclosure.
Data Entity Description: Quantified objectives the fund seeks to achieve under normal market conditions.
Data Element Description: Expected annualized net return over the strategic horizon.

Process Description: Defines the strategic investment approach and mandate for a fund, aligning with risk appetite, asset allocation, and performance objectives. This process sets the foundation for portfolio construction and compliance with regulatory and client requirements.

Process Description: Defines the strategic investment approach and mandate for a fund, aligning with risk appetite, asset allocation, and performance objectives. This process sets the foundation for portfolio construction and compliance with regulatory and client requirements.
Sub-Process Description: Defines the fund’s tolerance for market, credit, liquidity, and operational risk; calibrates volatility targets, drawdown limits, and concentration thresholds to align with mandate and governance.
Data Entity Description: Board-approved articulation of acceptable risk levels.
Data Element Description: Conservative / Moderate / Aggressive (mapped to governance taxonomy).

Process Description: The structured, governance-backed workflow that transforms macroeconomic insights and sector research into investable ideas, validated through fundamental analysis, valuation modeling, forecasting, risk assessment, and formal approval. It ensures traceability from thesis to execution and alignment with mandate, benchmark, and risk controls.
Sub-Process Description: Systematic analysis of growth, inflation, rates, FX, policy, and systemic risk to establish top-down views that inform cross-asset positioning and theme formulation.
Data Element Description: CPI, GDP Growth, PMI, Unemployment Rate, Policy Rate, FX Index.

Process Description: Produces and disseminates performance reports, attribution summaries, and narratives to clients, regulators, and internal stakeholders; ensures compliance and consistency across channels.
Sub-Process Description: Matches broker confirmations with internal trade records to ensure economic terms agree; resolves mismatches via break management.
Data Entity Description: Structured data and exhibits for reporting.

Process Description: Produces and disseminates performance reports, attribution summaries, and narratives to clients, regulators, and internal stakeholders; ensures compliance and consistency across channels.
Sub-Process Description: Generates and transmits settlement details (SSIs) to custodians/CPs; monitors settlement status, manages fails and penalties to protect Fund Performance.
